works.title: Case Studies
works.description: Real-world projects demonstrating expertise in problem-solving.

items.title: Multi-SaaS Platform Common Infrastructure
items.challenge: Needed a common infrastructure to release multiple SaaS products quickly while maintaining development efficiency and quality.
items.solution: Standardized non-functional requirements (logging, monitoring, backup) with Terraform. Implemented unified tenant management with Observability Access Manager.
items.result: Significantly improved operational efficiency and observability. Established reusable architecture across products.

items.title: GenAI Multi-Cloud Infrastructure Design
items.challenge: Required secure communication between Azure and AWS with enterprise-level availability and operational control.
items.solution: Designed Azure-AWS VPN with AZ-redundant configuration. Implemented IaC with Terraform for consistent multi-environment deployment.
items.result: Achieved 99.9% availability between AWS-Azure. Expanded Azure OpenAI token limits 10x+, eliminating 429 errors.

items.title: Enterprise ChatGPT Platform
items.challenge: Enterprise clients needed secure ChatGPT alternative with high-traffic scalability.
items.solution: Designed infrastructure with Azure OpenAI, IaC implementation, CI/CD. Optimized Tokenizer to dramatically reduce response time.
items.result: Deployed to 100+ companies. 3,000+ daily active users per client, 50,000+ requests/day. Reduced response wait from 30s to <1s.

items.title: GenAI RAG Evaluation & E2E Test Automation
items.challenge: Needed quality assurance for RAG and test automation to keep up with frequent updates. Manual testing was too time-consuming.
items.solution: Built RAG auto-evaluation CI environment for continuous quality metrics. Implemented Playwright E2E testing with Kubernetes parallel execution.
items.result: Enabled continuous RAG quality monitoring. Reduced test execution time by 70% through parallelization. Accelerated release cycles.

items.title: ARM Template to Terraform Migration
items.challenge: Azure using ARM Template increased operational overhead and learning curve vs. Terraform for AWS/GCP.
items.solution: Led 5-person team to migrate VM/AVD deployments to Terraform. Built CI/CD for automated apply on GitHub push.
items.result: Enabled deployment of 350+ VMs via GitHub Push. Reduced manual work by 50%.

items.title: AI Incident Detection System
items.challenge: Official AWS/Azure incident notifications were often delayed; needed earlier detection mechanism.
items.solution: Developed ML-based detection system using social media data. Implemented model training and inference pipeline.
items.result: Detected incidents 30+ minutes before official announcements. Achieved 98% accuracy. Obtained patent as primary inventor.

items.title: AR Face Measurement Android App
items.challenge: No mobile app existed for measuring facial surface area.
items.solution: Designed and developed AR-based mobile app with Unity (C#). Handled entire lifecycle from spec to release.
items.result: 10,000+ downloads on Play Store. Tripled ad revenue.
